refnamediv.refpurpose: Get name of the table the specified field is in

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the name of the table that the specified field is in.

example.title: A mysql_field_table example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$result = mysql_query("SELECT name,comment FROM people,comments");
if (!$result) {
    echo 'Could not run query: ' . mysql_error();
    exit;
}

// Assuming name is in the people table
$table = mysql_field_table($result, 'name');
echo $table; // people
?>

refsect1.para: For downward compatibility mysql_fieldtable can also be used. This is deprecated, however.
